name: Aditya Nagraj Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Orgnisation is running Charity Hospital at Palam tq. Palam Dist. Parbhani for poor, rural people. Various multidiagnostic and Health Awareness Camps are arranged. Health Club and Yoga Centre is also being run by our Trust.Nursing Institute (ANM Course)is also being run by our Trust.We are working as PTO (Project Training Organization) and LRA (Livelihood Resource Agency)in IWMP- Integrated Watershed management Program which is funded by Govt.of Maharashtra.We worked with 13 watershed committees including 20 villages in Manora Taluka ,Dist.Washim as PTO.We worked as LRA with 9 villages in Manwat Taluka ,Dist.Parbhani and 8 villages in Jalkot and Udgir Taluka Dist.Latur during financial year 2015-16.We are also working as an Implementing Agency in CAIM (Convergence of Agricultural Interventions in Maharashtra) Project, Subject- Mangrulpir Dist.Washim.
